'''Fragrant Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake''' is an Event Item obtained during the [[Spices From the West: Northerly Search]] Event.

It can be created by adding [[Fragrant Seasoning]] to Delicious [[Crab, Ham & Veggie Bake]] in the event menu.

==Character Taste-Test Responses==
